DataElement.preferredName: Adult History Substance Abuse Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age._The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events._Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.
